captions.text: Back when I didn't have a penny to spare, sleepless
I've accomplished a few more now
We were stupid enough to learn lessons the hard way
Everytime we fell, we added a line to our resumes
The thrill of beautiful success
Whistles for a brief time
But the storm found me again before I could finish a song
Envy, jealousy, and mistakes from the pressure
Conceit and laziness turns homeruns into misses
It felt like game over but we kept moving forward
shouting get out of our way
No u-turns down the thorny road where we can't see a thing
We walked side by side with intense loyalty
Tragedy hurts but it's all comedy after time
So we go on enduring each day
I call myself crazy and keep dreaming, not giving up on hope
Dream yet to give up on despite the cruel reality
Dream sometimes too burdensome in the deep harsh valleys of life
But I want to walk slow for long, until the end of time
I am desperate now for a piece of peace of mind
In this city, spacing out is a luxury
I exploit myself like a bad habit
My neck stiffens and mind hardens
We sweat hard on stage but it's from fear not excitement
Problems pile up even when we sleep
We have to deal as soon as we get up, but that's hard
Unless we chop up time like food on the cuttingboard
the day turns into a mess like a menu without a recipe
Exhaustion can't ease the voidness, the vanity
This tension reminds me of the broke but carefree person I was 15 years ago
I can understand my 35 years, even if it's all fake
Maybe we got lucky, maybe our names were built
Let's not lose sight
Let's keep criticizing and share insight?
Wrinkles bloom on my face like Al Pacino's face
Evaluate after we finish life's long race
Dream yet to give up on despite the cruel reality
Dream sometimes too burdensome in the deep harsh valleys of life
But I want to walk slow for long, until the end of time
I am desperate now for a piece of peace of mind
So I got some dirt on my hands
and I may drive a better, faster car
but we're all headed the same way
No matter how many times, I hurt over people and love again
I guess I'm still a kid
It's not living, but surviving
My hair's falling out and my mind's closing in
I hope a flower blooms within, for my inner peace
Like a lotus in the mud
Dream yet to give up on despite the cruel reality
Dream sometimes too burdensome in the deep harsh valleys of life
But I want to walk slow for long, until the end of time
I am desperate now for a piece of peace of mind

comments.text:
(and the game won’t change just the same old thing x 2)

Choiza>
동전 한 잎 조차 아쉽고 일 없어
잠 못 들던 그때보다 조금은 이뤘어
우리는 바보처럼 몸으로 부딪히면서 배웠어
넘어질 때마다 일어서 다시 고쳐 썼지 이력서
눈부신 성공에 신바람 잠시나마
불어봤던 휘파람 한 곡도 채 끝나기 전에
그림자처럼 날 따라온 비 바람
시기 질투 기대의 압박을 못이긴 몇 번의 실축
자만 나태함 속에 던졌던 만루홈런을 맞는 실투
다 끝 난 거 같았지만
우린 우리앞길을 막지마 라고 외치며
마음을 다 잡곤 했었지

이 험한 현실에서 아직 붙잡아두고 싶은 꿈
높고 힘든 삶의 능선에서 때론 포기하고 싶은 꿈

he's been in the game for a long time. also, Common, jedi mind tricks..

people like tyga get paid that much for sprouting illogical shit.. it's not

comments.author: Giri93067

comments.text:
+Giri93067 I mean.. mainstream hip hop in the USA was shit until a few 
years back, but now there's a bunch of amazing rappers that are killing 
shit in the US. They're amazing.

Lupe Fiasco, Logic, Kendrick Lamar, J. Cole to name a few. The one's you 
mentioned aren't considered to be "lyrical" rappers at all.

But anyways, I love both K-HipHop and A-HipHop. Korean rappers are becoming 
more and more better and I don't doubt they'll take over the game soon 
enough.

comments.text:
곱씹을 수록 가사가 정말 멋지네요.
첨에 그냥 이걸 들었을때 (물론 비트나 전체적인 느낌은 엄청난 프로듀서덕분에 너무 좋았지만) 가사가 왜케 진부하고 플로가 밋밋하냐 
이런생각을 했었는데,
몇번을 듣다보니  정말 이 사람들 진심을 담은 가사들이 가슴에 꽂히네요

과거 한국말 랩을 어떻게 하는지 라임플로가뭔지도 잘 안잡혔던 시절부터, 힙합이 대세인 지금 까지 계속 힙합을 하고있는 이 사람들이 
만들어낸것들 ..그리고 자기네들도 어렸을때 프리모 비트에다가 가사쓰고 후진 마이크로 녹음하고 그랬을텐데 지금은 프리모와 같이 작업을 
한다니 ,정말기분어떨까요ㅜㅜ 부럽고 리스펙합니다다듀!! ﻿
